Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4277793,"totalDownVotes":784050,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":241655,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👪 Adote ou seja adotado, decore a sua própria casa, explore a Ilha de Adoções e muito, muito mais! 👪

Créditos do jogo: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/adopt-me-credits/71812"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":638800,"totalDownVotes":48396,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":85680,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3816611,"totalDownVotes":314871,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":87993,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Você pode resolver o mistério e sobreviver a cada rodada?

ASSASSINO: Eliminar TODOS. Não seja atingido pelo xerife.

Colete e troque centenas de facas!


Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2813159,"totalDownVotes":367641,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":36829,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons!

"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":312806,"totalDownVotes":33113,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『New STAND』 Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":27256,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW STAND UPDATE』 🏹✨
➢ New stand (ANUBIZ), skins, reworks, and more!

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Give the game page a thumbs-up like and subscribe to our Youtube below for more codes:
➢ youtube.com/channel/UCwxB9DjiJKOcZbDPIvsCZBg?sub_confirmation=1

Disclaimers:
➢ You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":541538,"totalDownVotes":37937,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":35494,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

🌀Team up with your friends to take on story mode or the infinity tower
🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour
Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates

🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":531824,"totalDownVotes":42932,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"🌌Tower Defense Simulator❄️","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":33279,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"[AVISO: ESTE JUEGO ESTÁ EN BETA. ES NORMAL QUE HAYA ERRORES.]
En este mundo, nadie puede sobrevivir solo. ¡Haz un equipo con amigos para defender innumerables oleadas de zombis, pelear contra jefes, ganar monedas, subir de nivel, y comprar nuevas torres!  Si te sientes preparado para un desafío, intenta asumir jefes más duros en dificultades más difíciles

👥💵 ¡Únete al grupo para +100$ de dinero inicial! https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494
👍¡Pulgar hacia arriba y favorito para más actualizaciones de calidad!🌟

🛠️ACTUALIZACIONES🛠️
+ ELECTROCUTADOR ⚡ 
+ LAS ALTURAS [MAPA] 
+ FURIA DEL REY CAÍDO 😡 
+ Mostrador de Estadísticas de las Torres 📊 
+ ¡Errores arreglados! 🛠️

Constructores: BiscuitTurtleKid & Beefchoplets

Check the in-game update log in new servers (the book with the !) for full details!

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3255061,"totalDownVotes":286506,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":51633,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":33140,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"The latest Jailbreak update is here!

This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1031105,"totalDownVotes":52028,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":24527,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":707115,"totalDownVotes":95241,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 💧 [WATER & BANNERS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":26787,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

spleenhook (https://twitter.com/spleenhook)

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":1235888,"creatorName":"The MLG Gang","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":21280,"totalDownVotes":1481,"universeId":2492481398,"name":"Noob Army Tycoon","placeId":6610021055,"playerCount":36888,"imageToken":"T_6610021055_7d68","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Attack the other noobs in this epic tycoon."},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":154480,"totalDownVotes":8329,"universeId":648454481,"name":"🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":13235,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1197731,"totalDownVotes":68197,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":20108,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":7284047,"creatorName":"Wrongful Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":27203,"totalDownVotes":6257,"universeId":2411591707,"name":"[5X STATS] A Hero's Destiny","placeId":6461766546,"playerCount":13822,"imageToken":"T_6461766546_8638","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Train with friends, battle difficult enemies, and complete challenging quests while working your way towards becoming the strongest! 

Changelog
- New code system
- New x2 XP/Yen/Strength boosts
- Added a confirmation for spinning when you have a legendary class
- Rebirths now increase spin luck 
- Added a buy all spins button
- Added another tyrone dummy npc to test critical damage
- Added 3 songs
- Scanner gamepass now abbreviates stats 

Controls
Z - Train
X - Lockon
N - Equip Sword (Ninja)
Q/E/R/F/C - Abilities
G - Awakening
CTRL - Sprint"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2343002,"totalDownVotes":246331,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":41655,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:

Crouch / Place trap - CTRL (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or B (Controller)

Credits:
IK3As - Chapter 3, Chapter 7, Chapter 9, Chapter 11 Builder, Additional Chapter 8 Building, Book 2 Chapter 2 and 5 Building
Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":239532,"totalDownVotes":21325,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[ DRAGON 🐉 ] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":21940,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Level Cap: 3100
There are 30 Physical Fruits In Game

- Fruits spawn in the map every 30 Minutes
- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":667222,"totalDownVotes":129249,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":8289,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":192839,"totalDownVotes":31576,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ BLEACH ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":8321,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Los beta testers obtienen el DLC de One Piece de manera gratuita.

Controles:
Shift: Correr
Q: Esquivar
F: Bloquear
Ataques Básicos: Mouse1
Espacio+Mouse1: Ataques Aéreos
Combina Ataques Básicos y Ataques Aéreos para descubrir nuevos combos.
Usa 1,2,3,4 para los movimientos especiales de tu personaje.
Transformación: G

Scripters: Snakeworl, jjjakey, Melon_Sensei
Constructores: Chicken_Man
Contribuidores: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA"},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1804888,"totalDownVotes":141051,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":7841,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":914685,"totalDownVotes":119053,"universeId":892043755,"name":"[🍀SUPER LUCK🍀] Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":10059,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Super Luck Event!
- 🍀 2x Luck
- 💪 2x Mythic
- ⚡ 2x Hatch Speed

🚨 UPDATE 75 🚨
🏆 New Bubble Pass for season 20!
💪 Competitive leaderboards are back!
🥚 New egg in the Shadow Realm (Corrupted Egg)
🐶 16 new pets!
🔥 ??
💰 60% off sale on all gamepasses!
💸 50% off sale on all boosts!
🐰 Easter event has ended! We hope you enjoyed our biggest egg hunt yet
🎮 Bug fixes for gamepad auto-hatch.

Subscribe to the Rumble Studios YouTube channel to redeem exclusive rewards, including a special pet, more inventory space, and free boosts! 👍 Tutorial: https://youtu.be/NweUYpsrS3c

Welcome to Bubble Gum Simulator! Blow bubbles to reach new heights in the clouds. Sell your bubbles or collect coins to buy upgrades! Hatch pets as companions to help you on your adventure.

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":279070,"totalDownVotes":145746,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":14291,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":9277770,"creatorName":"Anime Legend Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":107675,"totalDownVotes":8776,"universeId":2317140681,"name":"[NARUTO UPDATE] Anime Mania","placeId":6284881984,"playerCount":8304,"imageToken":"T_6284881984_34ef","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"This is Anime Mania. Upon joining the game, it is suggested that you spend some of the gems that you have rolling on a few characters. Then you should equip 3 of these characters in order to make your team. After making your team, you can play the game by starting a room and you can either invite your friends or play alone. Obtain more characters, win the arenas, and upgrade your characters! 

PC Controls:
Left Click: Basic Attack
Right Click: Heavy Attack
